name: Angry Gorilla City Attack
description:
Humans have always been a threat to jungle life, with the increasing human population there is a constant need to find new places for living, by cutting down forests and wildlife habitat. Now you keep this scenario in your mind, and in Angry Gorilla City Attack you have been assigned to act wild to rage your anger, and show humans that you are really upset by all this forest cutting thing and take revenge from them that you have come to show that how it feels when someone takes your place from you or kills your babies.
In this free-to-play game, you play as humanity’s close relative. But, we sure do hope you don’t behave like this! You’re a jungle beast on the loose! Release your inner animal--cause ultimate destruction in the modern city. Trample down swing sets and trees; smash and dent cars; feel the thrill of disturbing un expecting pedestrians from their homes! Thrash and run through the city un-relentlessly. Fight for your freedom furiously while people attempt to reign you in. Even Tarzan would be ashamed!

This is a very intense game. If you keep all the above things in your mind, this will make you highly emotional and enthusiastic to play Angry Gorilla City Attack. This game is all about " Hunt or to be Hunted" , because humans have minds that can make it difficult for you to act sharp or make more destruction, yet you have some tricks and plans to prove them wrong and do your angry fight with them.

Feature
• Realistic gorilla simulations with fantasy 3D crazy city.
• Multiple gorillas to choose for ultimate gorilla games 3D.
• Realistic and thrilling gorilla sound.
• Easy, Smooth and addictive game play
• Multiple action packed missions
• Stunning 3D graphics and city environment
